name: Zombie: Day by Day
description:
The zombie apocalypse has come, and now you must survive, day by day!

- Assign members to missions, training or projects to survive and prosper.
- Send teams on missions to:
-recruit new members
-find weapons (11 types) and ammo
-scavenge food, materials and specials
-kill Zombies and evil humans
- Train survivors across 9 skill classes plus specific skill training like rifle, pistol, etc.
- Plan and build projects to upgrade your society and increase happiness.
- Fight 7 types of zombies and enemy humans in turn based tactical combat.
- Upgrade your security and comfort to increase happiness in your society.
- Once firmly established, defeat rival human groups to pave the way for a new future!
